titleStmt.title: A True account of the proceedings at the Sessions for London and Middlesex begun in the Old-Bailey on Wednesday the twenty-sixth of May, 1680 giving the substance of the tryals of several malefactors, the number and crimes of those comdemned, burnt in the hand &c. : with an account of the proceedings against Captain Tom.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace (London)

notesStmt.note: Imprint suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
